ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:42:10 [Issue ID 4000-112951] urn:comicvine:4000-112951 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 14:34:53. [Issue ID 307725]
ComicInfo.Summary: An all-new storyline drawn by the stunning FÁBIO MOON ignites here as CASANOVA returns with the perfect jumping-on point for new readers. What terrible truth lurks inside of Dokkktor Klockhammer’s horror hospital? How much time passes on page 11? Who’s the stone-cold fox behind the stick of that sick assault aircraft from the future? Do all women from the future look like that? We hope so -- because that’s where we’re spending all our tomorrows. Besides, only a girl from the future would dare ask... WHEN IS CASANOVA QUINN?
ComicInfo.Title: In Media Res
